statements: SELECT * FROM CarbonFootprintData
SELECT id, location FROM CarbonFootprintData WHERE emission_amount > 100
SELECT location, emission_amount FROM CarbonFootprintData ORDER BY emission_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM CarbonFootprintData WHERE emission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT AVG(emission_amount) AS average_emission FROM CarbonFootprintData
SELECT * FROM CarbonFootprintData WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY emission_date DESC
SELECT location, SUM(emission_amount) AS total_emission FROM CarbonFootprintData GROUP BY location HAVING total_emission > 1000
SELECT AVG(emission_amount) AS average_emission FROM CarbonFootprintData WHERE location = 'California'
SELECT * FROM CarbonFootprintData WHERE emission_date > '2022-01-01' AND emission_amount < 100 ORDER BY emission_date ASC
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS data_count FROM CarbonFootprintData GROUP BY location ORDER BY data_count DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM emissions ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, amount FROM emissions WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM reduction_efforts WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM emissions WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31';
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_emissions FROM emissions;
SELECT * FROM emissions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, location FROM emissions WHERE location LIKE '%USA%' ORDER BY date;
SELECT id, date, amount FROM emissions JOIN reduction_efforts ON emissions.id = reduction_efforts.id WHERE cost < 500;
SELECT * FROM emissions WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND location = 'Europe';
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_emissions, AVG(cost) AS avg_cost FROM emissions JOIN reduction_efforts ON emissions.id = reduction_efforts.id;
SELECT * FROM emissions
SELECT id, date, location FROM emissions WHERE emissions > 100
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT activity_name, activity_description FROM activities WHERE emissions_saved < 50
SELECT id, date FROM emissions WHERE location LIKE 'New%'
SELECT * FROM emissions WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, activity_name FROM activities WHERE activity_description LIKE '%sustainable%' ORDER BY activity_name ASC;
SELECT date, SUM(emissions) FROM emissions GROUP BY date HAVING SUM(emissions) > 1000;
SELECT u.username, SUM(e.emissions) as total_emissions FROM users u JOIN emissions e ON u.id = e.id GROUP BY u.username ORDER BY total_emissions DESC;
SELECT a.activity_name, u.username, e.date FROM activities a JOIN users u ON a.id = u.id JOIN emissions e ON u.id = e.id WHERE e.emissions > 50 ORDER BY e.date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM emissions_data;
SELECT id, emission_source, emission_amount FROM emissions_data WHERE emission_amount > 100;
SELECT date, emission_source FROM emissions_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, emission_source FROM emissions_data ORDER BY emission_source DESC;
SELECT id, emission_amount FROM emissions_data WHERE emission_amount < 50 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM emissions_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, emission_source, emission_amount FROM emissions_data WHERE emission_amount > 100 ORDER BY emission_amount DESC
SELECT date, emission_source, emission_amount FROM emissions_data JOIN emission_sources ON emissions_data.emission_source = emission_sources.source_name
SELECT date, emission_source, emission_amount FROM emissions_data WHERE emission_amount > 5000 AND emission_source LIKE '%transport%'
SELECT id, method, reduction_amount FROM reduction_efforts WHERE reduction_amount < 500 ORDER BY reduction_amount ASC
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions;
SELECT emission_source, emission_amount FROM carbon_emissions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, emission_source FROM carbon_emissions ORDER BY emission_amount DESC;
SELECT AVG(emission_amount) AS avg_emission_amount FROM carbon_emissions GROUP BY emission_source HAVING avg(emission_amount) > 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_emissions FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions;
SELECT id, emission_source FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_amount > 100;
SELECT DISTINCT emission_source FROM carbon_emissions ORDER BY emission_source DESC;
SELECT SUM(emission_amount) AS total_emission FROM carbon_emissions GROUP BY emission_source;
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_source LIKE 'Car%';
